Package it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.model.gameoperations.expansion

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ListFunction<T,​E>
    Brief A ListFunction is a specialized Function that when applied, it returns a List as result
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AccumulatorExpandable<T,​S,​U extends Expansion<T,​S>,​V,​R,​A>
    Represents a complex expandable that makes use of an accumulator and of inputs to manifest his behaviour based on expansions.
    ConsumerExpansion<T,​S>
    Brief Specific supported Expansion for ExpConsumer

    Brief Represents an expandable object.
    Expansion<T,​S>
    Brief Represents an expansion that has a custom object, a type (can be expansive or restrictive), one or more markers
    ExpConsumer<T,​S>
    Brief Expandable Consumer, it represents a special Consumer that can be expanded with more consumers.
    ExpFunction<T,​R,​S,​A>
    Brief Expandable Function, it represents a special Function that can be expanded with more functions.
    ExpListFunction<T,​E,​S>
    Brief Expandable ListFunction, it represents a special ListFunction that can be expanded with more functions.
    ExpPredicate<T,​S>
    Brief Expandable Predicate, it represents a special Predicate that can be expanded with more functions.
    FunctionExpansion<T,​R,​S>
    Brief Specific supported Expansion for ExpFunction
    ListFunctionExpansion<T,​E,​S>

    PredicateExpansion<T,​S>

    Brief Represents a simple expandable implementation.
